title: Senator Ben Cardin on Tariffs, Trade & G-20
itunes:title: Senator Ben Cardin on Tariffs, Trade & G-20
description:
Kevin spoke with Richard Fowler, Nationally Syndicated Radio Show Host and Fox News Contributor, and Brendan Buck, Former Spokesman and Advisor to House Speaker Paul Ryan and partner at Blue Engine Message & Media. They discussed President Trump's meeting with Polish President Andrzej Duda, Mexico and China tariffs, and 2020 elections. 

Akunna Cook, founding executive director of the Black Economic Alliance, discussed their new nationwide survey focused exclusively on economic priorities for African Americans. The group has a presidential forum later this week in South Carolina with a major focus on economic issues.

Sen. Ben Cardin (D-MD), Finance Committee member, discussed tariffs, trade and and the Nord Stream 2 project.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
